channel.title: 美联社
channel.description: 这是一个追踪美联社news的种子

item.title: 杰夫-罗斯（Jeff Ross）说，"瑞奇-斯坦尼奇 "主演约翰-塞纳可能 "难以忍受"。
item.description:
Jeff Ross says "Ricky Stanicky" star John Cena may be "unroastable." pic.twitter.com/bvey9glut4

— AP Entertainment (@APEntertainment) March 6, 2024

item.title: 皇家加勒比客舱服务员被控在浴室藏匿摄像头监视客人
item.description:
Royal Caribbean cabin attendant accused of hiding cameras in bathrooms to spy on guests https://t.co/EpAEdd6AEd

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 6, 2024

item.title: 美联社询问了海利在早期初选州的支持者，他们将投票给谁作为他们的B计划。
item.description:
Nikki Haley suspended her presidential campaign Wednesday, leaving Donald Trump as the last remaining major candidate for the 2024 GOP nomination.

AP asked Haley supporters in early primary states who they will vote for as their plan B. Take a listen. pic.twitter.com/RNoYeCNxDk

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 6, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：明尼苏达州民主党众议员迪安-菲利普斯（Dean Phillips）结束了对总统乔-拜登（Joe Biden）的初选挑战。
item.description:
BREAKING: Democratic Rep. Dean Phillips of Minnesota ends his long-shot primary challenge against President Joe Biden. https://t.co/3lkGheRGVP

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 6, 2024

item.title: 美国国税局（IRS）的一项新计划正在帮助第一批用户以电子方式申报所得税。而且是免费的
item.description:
A new IRS program is helping its first users file their income taxes electronically. And it's free https://t.co/Q0umc1pUQQ

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 6, 2024

item.title: 约翰-塞纳（John Cena）在回顾自己从无家可归到成为巨星的历程时，希望 "赢得每一刻"。他与扎克-埃夫隆联袂主演了《瑞奇-斯坦尼奇》。
item.description:
John Cena wants to "earn every moment" as he reflects on his journey from homelessness to superstardom. He stars alongside Zac Efron in "Ricky Stanicky." pic.twitter.com/TpKOKTNMwY

— AP Entertainment (@APEntertainment) March 6, 2024

item.title: 乌克兰发现的古代石器可追溯到 100 多万年前，可能是欧洲最古老的石器
item.description:
Ancient stone tools found in Ukraine date to over 1 million years ago, and may be oldest in Europe https://t.co/wUkC4anycw

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 6, 2024

item.title: 周二，谢琳-伍德利出席了在西好莱坞举行的 "时代女性年度人物 "活动。
item.description:
Activism is an extension of art for Shailene Woodley, who attended the Time Women of the Year event in West Hollywood on Tuesday. pic.twitter.com/VF59B6FJq8

— AP Entertainment (@APEntertainment) March 6, 2024

item.title: 在公司和其他方面的强烈反对下，美国证券交易委员会削弱了一项拟议的气候披露规则。它将不再要求公司报告某些温室气体的排放量。
item.description:
The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission has weakened a proposed climate disclosure rule after strong pushback from companies and others. It will no longer require companies to report some greenhouse gas emissions. https://t.co/EdDftVt5Fw

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 6, 2024

item.title: 韩国总统誓言绝不容忍初级医生罢工
item.description:
South Korea's president vows not to tolerate walkouts by junior doctors https://t.co/wu7YaCQbLs

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 6, 2024

item.title: 乔-拜登总统在 "超级星期二 "席卷了民主党的所有竞选活动--除了美属萨摩亚。请听获胜候选人杰森-帕尔默（Jason Palmer）的发言。
item.description:
President Joe Biden was sweeping every Democratic contest on Super Tuesday — except for American Samoa. Hear from the candidate who won, Jason Palmer. pic.twitter.com/lVzA1ml6EN

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 6, 2024

item.title: 菲律宾称不会让中国撤除菲律宾在争议浅滩上的军事哨所
item.description:
The Philippines says it won't let China remove a Filipino military outpost on a disputed shoal https://t.co/sJ5CKlmLgw

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 6, 2024

item.title: 对于巴黎奥运会来说，这几乎可以成为一项新的运动：通过寻找一位自称为 "入侵者 "的神秘艺术家在法国首都墙壁上粘贴的马赛克来得分。
item.description:
For the Paris Olympics, it could almost be a new sport: Score points by hunting down mosaics that a mystery artist who calls himself “Invader” has cemented to walls across France’s capital. https://t.co/snmeuXKPnw pic.twitter.com/q9kdg0RBfj

— AP Sports (@AP_Sports) March 6, 2024

item.title: 普京镇压异见人士如何成为这位俄罗斯领导人 24 年执政的标志
item.description:
How Putin's crackdown on dissent became the hallmark of the Russian leader’s 24 years in power https://t.co/OI2vrEUGvu

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 6, 2024

item.title: 尼基-黑莉在 "超级星期二 "全国大败之后，于周三暂停了她的总统竞选活动，唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）成为 2024 年共和党提名的最后一位主要候选人。
item.description:
Nikki Haley suspended her presidential campaign Wednesday after being soundly defeated across the country on Super Tuesday, leaving Donald Trump as the last remaining major candidate for the 2024 Republican nomination. pic.twitter.com/hEFWYQxv15

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 6, 2024

item.title: 原产于北太平洋的鲸鱼在新英格兰海域做什么？气候变化可能是关键
item.description:
What is a whale native to the North Pacific doing off New England? Climate change could be the key https://t.co/5cle5YV3Vw

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 6, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：参议院共和党领袖米奇-麦康奈尔支持唐纳德-特朗普竞选总统，称他 "将获得我的支持"。
item.description:
BREAKING: Senate Republican Leader Mitch McConnell endorses Donald Trump for president, saying he "will have my support." https://t.co/hNyEYg8KBR

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 6, 2024

item.title: 在纽约送餐很简单。但对于送餐工人来说，获得报酬却不是一件容易的事。
item.description:
Getting food delivered in New York is simple. For the workers who do it, getting paid is not https://t.co/w1cAQLr7J5

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 6, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：尼基-黑莉（Nikki Haley）在 "超级星期二 "之后退出竞选，她没有为唐纳德-特朗普背书。相反，她鼓励特朗普赢得温和派共和党人的支持。
item.description:
BREAKING: Nikki Haley didn’t endorse Donald Trump as she dropped out of the race after Super Tuesday. Instead, she encouraged him to earn the support of moderate Republicans. https://t.co/4xwHea6D00

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 6, 2024

item.title: 爆料：消息人士称，尼基-黑莉将暂停竞选活动，这使得特朗普通往2024年共和党提名的道路畅通无阻。尼基-黑莉是第一位赢得共和党初选的女性，她创造了历史。
item.description:
BREAKING: Nikki Haley will suspend her campaign, sources say, leaving Trump's path clear to the 2024 Republican nomination. She made history as the first woman to win a GOP primary. https://t.co/BkE5hbt55H

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 6, 2024
